rules_text:
Spaceflight [i](This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.)[/i]
Whenever this Vehicle deals combat damage to an opponent or a permanent they protect, you may pay {2}{WU}. If you do, exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. [i](Players protect permanents that can be attacked.)[/i]
Crew 1
